entry.title: New release for Postiz: CRON EVERY HOURS: check for missing jobs and add them
entry.content:
Assuming something happened to your Redis, jobs were deleted (for some reason). This job runs every hour and tests for 3 hours ahead of missing jobs, adding them as needed.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v2.2.3...v2.2.4

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Using parse5 to make sure the HTML is intact
entry.content:
We are using TipTap, but I have already seen a few cases where it breaks the HTML. Generally speaking, it's not a big deal since we usually strip it. However, for platforms like Telegram, where we send HTML, it can be a significant issue.

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v2.2.4...v2.2.5

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Support Hyperlinks in TipTap editor
entry.content: You can now add hyperlinks in the tiptap editor. Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v2.2.5...v2.3.0
